alert.note: Alert for Northwest Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 09 at 10:20AM EST until further notice by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Maryland... Seneca Creek at Dawsonville affecting Northwest Montgomery zone. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Seneca Creek at Dawsonville. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 7.5 feet, Portions of the Seneca Creek Greenway are flooded. A small portion of Berryville Road west of Darnestown begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:50 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 2.3 feet, or 5.2 feet below flood stage. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 7.5 feet. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information && River Name Fld Observed Tue Wed Wed Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time 7PM 1AM 7AM Stg Time Date Seneca Creek Dawsonville 7.5 2.3 Tue 9 am 3.4 6.0 7.2 7.2 7am Wed &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/washington or www.weather.gov/baltimore. The next statement will be issued this evening at 630 PM EST.
